# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/d3-transition`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for D3JS d3-transition module (https://github.com/d3/d3-transition/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/d3-transition

Additional Details

 * Dependencies: d3-selection
 * Global values: none
